item.title: Active Therapy
item.description:
Active Therapy

the act of physically engaging in an activity that mentally stimulates the mind creatively

item.title: Are you confident that you can BE A STARTUP with your brilliant idea right now? The path to creating an epic life starts with planning, then execution. What Are You Waiting For?
item.description:
Are you confident that you can BE A STARTUP with your brilliant idea right now? The path to creating an epic life starts with planning, then execution. What Are You Waiting For?

You've got great ideas but really... you've got one that you KNOW would be a hit, right? I mean, really. You look around and there are so many people in your viewfinder that are doing cool stuff that they love and are making $$$ from it.

item.title: 5 Ways to Make 2016 A Milestone of Success
item.description:
5 Ways to Make 2016 A Milestone of Success

We’ve been taught that the conquering of the New Year is for quitting bad habits and making good, new ones. I’ve always felt this was such a negative way to look backward and forward. I prefer to see the bad and good and recognize them for what they are… my experience.
